snippet: Mr. Lansky, who owned a men’s wear store in the music district of Memphis, sold outfits to Elvis Presley, Carl Perkins, Isaac Hayes, the Jacksons, the Beach Boys, Johnny Cash and others.
abstract: Bernard Lansky, famed Memphis haberdasher who served Elvis Presley and other music celebrities, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lansky, who owned a men’s wear store in the music district of Memphis, sold outfits to Elvis Presley, Carl Perkins, Isaac Hayes, the Jacksons, the Beach Boys, Johnny Cash and others.

headline.seo: Bernard Lansky, Clothier to Music Royalty, Dies at 85
headline.main: Bernard Lansky, Clothier Catering to Music Royalty, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Bernard Lansky, 85, Clothier Catering to Music Royalty
